name: Zap! (Trident19)
description:
Zap!

Is a simple 2d electricity game where you have to light a bulb with your electric ball and avoid electric walls. Some walls are moving&rotating. There are collectible stars along the way which are optional to collect. 

- Game is made using the Godot Game Engine

- Controls are mouse-only

- Music packs used in this game:

https://enriquecdl.itch.io/free-cyberpunk-music-pack-vol-1

https://pck404.itch.io/casual-gaming-free-music-loop-pack-01
